Judith and her husband work hard to sell their catch at the market. Sometimes, wholesale buyers from other towns and cities come to buy their fish. With their savings, they decided to expand their business.  Judith requests 8,000 PHP to buy piglets to raise. This is their fist venture into raising hogs.  

They feel assured of Paglaum’s help, should there be a need for working capital in the future. Judith smiles at the thought of seeing the business expand.

loans.use: to buy piglets to raise.

loans.name: Marco

texts.es: En la ciudad de Borbón, Provincia de Esmeraldas el señor Marco de 40 años vive con su conyugue y tiene un hijo de 14 años quien se encuentra asistiendo al colegio. Él se dedica a la agricultura  desde que era muy joven. Comenta que gracias al crédito que le otorgó FODEMI pudo comprar y sembrar 2000 plantas de cacao en sus tierras que son muy fértiles y que espera que en la cosecha pueda vender 20 quintales  de cacao quincenalmente. Para todo este proceso ocupa a 4 trabajadores diariamente. Su meta es aumentar sus sembríos, dar trabajo a más personas e incrementar sus ingresos para seguir apoyando a su hijo en sus estudios y que llegue a ser un buen profesional.
texts.en:
Marco, age 40, lives in the city of Borbón in the Esmeraldas province.  He lives with his wife, and he has a 14 year old son, who attends school.  Marco has been farming ever since he was very young.  

He says that thanks to the loan that was granted by FODEMI, he was able to buy and plant 2,000 cacao plants on his land, which is very fertile.  He hopes that in the harvest he will be able to sell 20 ‘quintales’ [a quintal is approximately 100 pounds] of cacao every two weeks.  This whole process occupies four workers daily.

His goal is to increase his crops, to give work to more people, and to increase his income in order to continue supporting his son’s education so that he will become a good professional.

loans.use: to buy 2,000 cacao plants.

loans.name: Kieu

texts.en:
Kieu is 43 years old and married with a son. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband is an electrician. Kieu has been running a shop selling phone cards and sugar-cane juice in front of her house for ten years. She is requesting a loan to repair her shop and to buy more phone cards to sell.

She hopes her business will run smoothly and will generate a higher income. This will to help her to improve her family's living conditions and send her child to school.

loans.use: to repair her shop and to buy more phone cards to sell.

loans.name: Anipa

texts.ru: Анипе 61 год, вдова одна воспитывает 3 детей. После смерти супруга, Анипа очень долго не могла пережить утрату близкого человека. Нужно было воспитывать и ставить на ноги детей и Анипа решила взять хозяйство и материальную ответственность в свои руки. У Анипы - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Анипа занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 14 лет назад, с покупки скота на 7,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Анипы, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 4 дойные коровы, 10 овец, а также имеет земельный надел размером 1,56 ГА, на которой выращивает ячмень, пшеницу и сено. Имеются все условия для содержания скота, заготовлено 200 штук прессованного сена и 1,5 тонны ячменя. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Анипа обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом - на покупку коров для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Анипа планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и намерена собрать средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Anipa is 61 years old and a widow, who raises three children by herself. After the death of her husband, Anipa for a long time thought she would not be able to survive the loss of her loved one. She had to raise and support her children, and Anipa decided to take on the financial and household responsibility by herself. Anipa has secondary education.

As a main source of income for her family, Anipa works with livestock breeding and field crop cultivation, after having started 14 years ago with the purchase of livestock for 7,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Anipa's persistent work, her farm currently has four dairy cows and 10 sheep. She also has a plot of land of 1.56 hectares, on which she grows barley, wheat and hay. She has all conditions for breeding cattle, having harvested 200 pieces of pressed hay and 1.5 tons of barley. The monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS). 

With an aim to further develop her business, Anipa turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan to purchase cows to fatten and subsequently resell at the market at a higher price. Anipa plans to invest the income from the loan in further increasing the number of livestock, and intends to save money for repairing her house.

loans.use: to buy cows for fattening and reselling

loans.name: Inna

texts.ru:
Инна — предприниматель-сельскохозяйственник из села Подстепное. Она 6 лет занимается тепличным бизнесом и огородничеством. На 70 сотках земли Инна выращивает три урожая ранних и поздних огурцов — примерно 8 000 кустов. 
Инне необходима сумма в 25 000 гривен для того, чтобы купить семена, дрова и удобрения, а также полиэтиленовую пленку для перетяжки теплиц и утепления их на время наступающего сезона.  Все полученные средства пойдут на содержание и усовершенствование тепличного хозяйства, а полученная прибыль — на нужды семьи.
texts.en:
Inna is an entrepreneur and village farmer from Podstepnoye. For six years she has run a greenhouse farm and garden. She grows three crops of early and late cucumbers on 70 acres of land, approximately 8,000 bushes. 

Inna needs 25,000 UAH to buy seeds, firewood and fertilizer, as well as plastic sheeting to cover the greenhouses and warm them during the upcoming season. All funds received will be used for the maintenance and improvement of her greenhouse farm, and the profits will go towards the needs of her family.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, plastic film, fertilizers and wood for greenhouses.

loans.name: Sheree-Ann

texts.en:
Sheree-Ann earns a living offering Nipa thatch weaving services.  She is 35 years old, married, and lives in Dopol,Bagumbang Bonifacio.  She is well known for the high quality services she offers.  She has previously purchased Nipa palm and was able to contribute to her savings.  Her services  yield a net profit of 5,000 PHP per month.  

Sheree-Ann  seeks a loan to purchase nipa palm for weaving. This is a regular loan and would be repaid within a few  months.  She has never had a delinquency in her previous loans.  Sheree-Ann is very diligent and accurate, qualities which add to effective management of her venture.

loans.use: to purchase  nipa palm for weaving.

loans.name: Hien

texts.en: Hien would like to take a further loan to buy more computers for her Internet shop to meet her clients' demands, and beverages for selling at her shop. Her previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attracting new customers and increasing sales. She also hopes that through the loan, she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy computers and beverages for selling at her shop.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
This is Rosalina, 34, a resident of Silang, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Pablito, and they have children. She and her husband are managing their household as they operate the business. At this time, she is working hard to provide income to their family.

Rosalina operates an Internet café business. Services like this have become a need as customers’ demand increases. Her main patrons are students, who require her services for school requirements. She has customers who need to rent computers for business purposes like writing a resume or any office documentation, as well as customers who just love to surf the 'net and visit any social network. She also has a farm for additional income. She earns a minimum of 1,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) in profit every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a 11,000 PHP loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy additional computer parts and accessories needed in her business.

Rosalina dreams to have additional units of computers and hopes that her children will finish their studies. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week. This is where she finds strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for additional computer parts and supplies needed in her business.

loans.name: Thuy

texts.en:
Thuy is a 41-year-old married woman who has three children, two sons and one daughter. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. She and her husband earn an income by running an internet shop in front of their house.

Thuy started this business four years ago. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying two more computers to meet her customers' demands. She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her with improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy two computers for her internet shop.

loans.name: Dao

texts.en:
Dao is 48 years old, and is widowed. She has been running a cafe in front of her door for 10 years. She started this business to cover her expenses, and raise her three sons. They live in Ho Chi Minh City.

Dao is requesting a loan to expand her business by offering more coffee, beverages, tea and cigarettes so that she will be able to increase the turnover of her business. 

She hopes that through the loan she will be able to expand her business activities, and have money to reinvest in her business in the future.

loans.use: To buy coffee, beverages, tea and cigarettes for selling

loans.name: Quynh

texts.en:
Quynh is requesting a new loan to buy furniture, appliances, raw food and ingredients to make meals to sell at her stall. She hopes that another loan will help her increase the size of her business, attract new customers and increase her income. She also hopes that, through the loan, she can increase
her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy furniture, appliances, raw food and ingredients to make meals to sell at her stall.

loans.name: Nhan

texts.en: Nhan would like to take a further loan to pay school fees for her child and repair her family's old scooter for transportation. Her previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attract new customers and increase sales. She also hopes that, through the loan, she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To pay school fees for her child and repair her family scooter for transportation.

loans.name: Thanh

texts.en: Thanh is a single, 61-year-old woman who lives in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. Thanh has been running a shop selling beverages for many years. She would like to receive a loan to buy a larger stock of beverages to sell at her shop. She hopes her business will cover her expenses so that she may set aside a part of income for savings.

loans.use: to buy beverages to sell.

loans.name: Odinagul

texts.ru:
Одинагул уроженка района Восеъ. Ей 45 лет. Она замужняя женщина и мать пятерых детей. У Одинагул четыре сына, старшему 22 года. Он с отцом работает преподавателем в сельской школе. Младшим сыновьям 15, 11 и 7 лет. Одинагул всегда хотела дочку и 5 лет назад стала мамой в пятый раз и родила девочку. Одинагул очень любит свою семью и старается сделать все, ради их благо.
   Пока муж и сын работают в школе, преподают и учат детей, Одинагул дома занимается животноводством, выращивает скотов. Ухаживать за скотами она научилась до замужества в родительском доме. И недавно Одинагул решила свои навыки использовать в бизнесе. На данный момент у нее имеется пару скотов и Одинагул хочет в серьез заняться бизнесом, чтобы принести в бюджет семьи значительный доход. Но для купли скота у нее не хватает средств, по этой причине она обратилась за кредитом. Одинагул надеется на Вашу помощь.
texts.en:
Odinagul is a native of the Vose region. She is 45 years old. She is a married woman and the mother of five children. Odinagul has four sons. The eldest one is 22 years old. He and his father work as teachers at the local school. The younger sons are 15, 11 and 7 years. Odinagul always wanted a daughter, and 5 years ago she became a mother for the fifth time and gave birth to a girl. Odinagul loves her family very much and strives to do everything for their benefit. 

While her husband and son work at the school, teaching the children, Odinagul works at home with livestock breeding. She learnt to take care of cattle before she was married, at her parents house. And not long ago, Odinagul decided to use her skills for business. Currently she has two heads of cattle and Odinagul would like to work properly with her business in order to bring significant income to her family budget. However she does not have enough money to purchase cattle. For this reason she applied for a loan. Odinagul hopes for your help.

loans.use: to purchase cattle and expand her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Tĩnh

texts.en:
Tĩnh is a 30-year-old married woman with 2 children. She lives and works in Nong Cong district, which is a rural area in Thanh Hoa province. 

She grows rice and raises poultry and cattle. Tĩnh has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Tĩnh faces in her business is the lack of capital. 

She and her family have access to only unsanitary toilets and therefore requests a loan to purchase material such as bricks, sand, and cement to build a toilet, bathroom and water tank . 

In 2014, Tĩnh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women, to improve her family's lives. This is Tĩnh's first loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Tĩnh hopes for her business to do well, to remodel her house, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase material such as bricks, sand, and cement to build a toilet, bathroom and water tank.

loans.name: Loan

texts.en: Loan would like to take a further loan to buy a greater variety of coal to sell at her store. Her previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attracting new customers and increasing sales. She also hopes that through the loan, she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy a greater variety of coal to sell at her store.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.en:
Roberto, 42 years of age, is married to an OFW (Overseas Filipino Worker) and blessed with one child. He has owned and managed a bakery in his village for almost two years, earning a net income of 3,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) every month. His daily profits are usually spent on food expenses and the school allowance of his son. 

Roberto wants a loan amounting to 10,000 PHP to purchase flour, flavorings and sugar to use in his business. He's hoping that his business will continue to grow and become more profitable.

loans.use: To purchase flour, flavorings and sugar to use in his business.

loans.name: Upel

texts.ru: Упел 57 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. Старший сын работает в районных электросетях-операционистом, супруг тоже работает здесь же-охранником, остальные дети школьного возраста. У Упел - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Упел занимается животноводством, стартовав 30 лет назад, с покупки скота на 1,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Упел, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 лошадь, 5 быков, 13 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 12,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Упел обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Упел планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en:
Upel is 57 years old, married and raising four children together with her husband. Her eldest son works at the regional electrical supplier. Her husband also works there, as a guard. The remaining children are of school age. Upel has secondary education.

As a source of income for her family, Upel works with livestock breeding, after having started 30 years ago with the purchase of livestock for 1,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Upel's persistent work, her farm currently has a horse, five bull-calves and 13 sheep. The monthly income is 12,000 som (KGS). 

With an aim to further develop her business, Upel turned to the bank "Bai Tushum" for a loan to purchase cows to increase the number of cattle. Upel plans to invest the income from the loan in further increasing the number of livestock. She also plans to save money for the future education of her children.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Emiliana

texts.en:
This is Emiliana, 54, a resident of Silang, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Catalino, a farmer. They have children. She and her husband manage their household while operating the business. They both work hard to provide for their everyday needs.

Emiliana operates a food stall. In the Philippines, the whole working community and most of the families only eat home-cooked meals during the evenings when all of the family members are at home to take part in the meal. This is not only a typical family tradition but also a matter of convenience and frugal living. It is considered a waste of money and time to spend money on cooking gas and food for one to two persons when buying cooked rice and viands cost less than raw food. She also has a farm for additional income. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of Php 800 in sales every day.

To help her maintain operations of her business, she is requesting a Php 8,000 loan. She will use the loan to buy more meat, rice, vegetables, condiments and seasonings, as well as frozen food products. 

Emiliana hopes that her business will be stable and dreams that her children will finish their studies. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration by studying the word of God.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and pay micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for ingredients like rice, pork, chicken and vegetables and other products needed in her business.

loans.name: Ngoc

texts.en:
Ngoc is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages, to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products.

She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increase sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy food and beverages for selling at her store.

loans.name: Hang

texts.en:
Hang would like to take a further loan to buy furniture, noodles and crabs for her food stall. Her previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attract new customers and
increase sales. She also hopes that, through the loan, she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy buy furniture, noodles and crabs for her food stall.

loans.name: Concepción

texts.es:
Concepción de 75 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, la familia de sus padres eran de bajos recursos económicos y no le podían brindar ningún tipo de estudio, ya que también era una familia numerosa y no tenían lo suficiente para mandarlos a la escuela, tenían que trabajar y ayudar en los gastos familiares. Tiene 4 hijos que ya son mayores de edad y tienen su propia familia, pero siempre están pendientes de sus padres.
Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, pero en los últimos meses ha tenido problemas de salud y Concepción ha tomado las riendas del trabajo y el cuido de los animales.

Ella  se dedica a la crianza de animales bovinos y a la agricultura, realiza esta actividad desde que sus hijos estaban  pequeños, junto a su esposo quien es experto en los animales y la agricultura, un trabajo defícil pero así reunirían un poco mas de dinero ya que no tienen otra fuente de ingresos. 
Ella va a dejar los animales a un potrero, también se dedica de lleno al trabajo agrícola desde que su esposo no puede ayudarle, se le hace mñas difícil y mas caro porque tiene que pagar mosos para el trabajo.

Concepción necesita este préstamo, para comprar 3 chivos, abono  y fertilizantes, así ella podrá tener mas animales que le generán mayor producción de leche y podrá  tener una cosecha abundante, cumpliendo lo que se ha propuesto, tener en lo hogar lo necesario.

Sus sueños a futuro son, ampliar su casa, tener un mayor número de animales que le generen mas ganancia. siempre ha sido una mujer que aprendió a vivir con lo indispensable, de manera que así lograra ahorrar y cuidar cada dólar que a lo largo de su vida le ha costado ganar.
texts.en:
Concepción is 75 years old. She did not have the opportunity to study, since her parents came from humble backgrounds and could not   
give her the chance to study. Her family was also very large and there were not sufficient funds to send everyone to school.  She had to work and help her family with the home expenses.  

She has four children who are all older with their own families. However, she feels that children always look to their parents for help.  Her husband makes a living in agriculture.  In the last few months, he has had health problems and so Concepción has taken over his work tasks and taking care of the animals.

She dedicates herself to raising cattle and to agriculture.  She has done this type of work since her children were very small, together with her husband; he is an expert in livestock and agriculture.  It is a tough job, but they are able to earn a little bit more money.  They do not have other sources of income.

She is going to leave the animals with a caretaker since she has to handle all the agricultural tasks now that her husband is no longer able to help her.  This is more difficult and more expensive for her because she has to pay fees for the caregiver.

Concepción needs this loan in order to purchase three goats, manure, and fertilizers.  This will allow her to have more animals, which will increase levels of milk production.  She will also be able to have a more abundant harvest, which will permit her to have what she needs in her home.

Her future dreams are to expand her house and to have a larger number of animals and therefore increase profits.  She has always been a woman who has learned to live with the bare essentials.  She has been able to save and take care of each dollar that she has earned throughout her life.

loans.use: to buy three goats, manure, and fertilizers.

loans.name: Thảo

texts.en:
Thảo is 22 years old. She is married with one child. She lives and works in Quảng Xương district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

Thảo works for a company in Thanh Hoa but she also operates an agricultural business of her own. Specifically, she grows rice and raises poultry and cattle. Thảo has been involved in this business for more than 30 years. The main hardship that Thảo faces in her business is a lack of capital.

Thảo is requesting a loan to purchase materials such as bricks, sand and cement to build a toilet because she and her family use unhygienic latrines. In 2014, Thảo joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her family's standard of living. This would be Thảo's first loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. With her future profits, Thảo hopes to expand her business, remodel her house, and buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to build and install a toilet by purchasing materials such as bricks, sand and cement

loans.name: Xoe

texts.en: Xoe is requesting a new loan to buy a larger quantity of vegetables to sell from her store. Her previous loan enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attracting new customers and increasing her sales. She also hopes that through the loan, she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy vegetables to sell from her store.

loans.name: Mercidita

texts.en:
Mercidita is a 47-year-old resident of Bacoor, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Eduardo, a driver, and they have children. She and her husband manage their household as they do their respective jobs. They are helping each other in generating income for their family.

Mercidita operates a variety store, which is a retail store that sells inexpensive items. Often, the items are all a single price in the store. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a PHP-5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns money by getting supplies at wholesale prices and then selling them by the piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 500 in sales every day.

She is requesting a PHP 15,000 loan to help her continue in the operation of her business. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries, and beverages to expand her product inventory.

Mercidita hopes that her business will last longer and she dreams of having their own house. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week. This is also where she can draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, to build social capital, and to repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Dung

texts.en:
Dung, 41 years old, is married and has two sons. Her husband is a driver for hire. She supports her family through the income she earns from selling cellphones, phone cards and helmets. She has been in this business for 10 years. They live in Ho Chi Minh City. 

She intends to take a loan to increase her working capital and buy many kinds of cellphones for selling at her shop, and will use a part of the loan for her sons' school fees. The additional capital will enable her to increase her sales. She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To pay school fees for her sons and buy cellphones for selling at her store.

loans.name: Minh

texts.en:
Minh is 70 years old and married with four children: a son and three daughters. He and his wife have been running a sewing shop in front of their house for 50 years. He started this business to cover his family expenses. They live in Ho Chi Minh City. 

Minh is requesting a loan to expand his business by buying more sewing materials and replacement parts for his sewing machines to enable him to make better quality products. He hopes that this will help him to attract more customers and increase the turnover of his business. He hopes that, with the loan, he will be able to expand his business activities and have money to reinvest.

loans.use: To buy sewing materials and replacement parts for his sewing machines.

loans.name: Loan

texts.en: Loan, 45, lives in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City with her family, including two children and her husband. Loan and her husband earn money through their business selling fish. Loan would like to get a loan to buy a larger quantity of fish to meet her customers' needs. She also hopes her business will ensure that her family members, and especially her children, will have a better education and a better future.

loans.use: To buy a larger quantity of fish to sell.

loans.name: Erving Manuel

texts.es: El señor Erving Manuel A.c. agricultor desde hace varios años, adicioanal el trabaja como albañil independiente por lo que obtiene ingreso adicional, actualmente tiene cosechada 2 manzanas de Piñas  las cuales requieren de mantenimiento, solicita el prestam para comprar insumos, Abono completo, Urea, Gramoxone, Gegapax, etc. asi su cosecha sera buena y al momento de comercializarla podra recibir matores ganancias, Agradece el apoyo brindado con este credito.
texts.en: Erving Manuel has been a farmer for several years. Also he works independently as a bricklayer which gives him additional income. At present he has two manzanas (about 3.5 acres) of pineapple plants growing which need maintenance. He is requesting a loan to buy inputs like fertilizer, Urea, herbicides, etc so that his harvest will be good and he can get better profits selling them. He thanks you for the support of this loan.

loans.use: to maintain his pineapple crops.

loans.name: Davaakhuu

texts.en:
Mrs. Davaakhuu, 54 years old, lives with her husband and son in Darkhan, the second largest city of Mongolia. She has been leading the association for customer protection since 1996. In 2005, she and her husband founded a non-government organization dedicated to teaching professions to people who left their university due to financial difficulty. 

Her son is currently studying Chinese at a university and didn't pay tuition fees on time. So she is requesting a loan of 1,500,000 MNT to pay for her son's tuition fees. Then her son can devote his full time for academic excellence and no longer worry about tuition fees. According to her, the education is the main way for her son to succeed in life. The borrower is very hardworking and respected by people for her service to people.

loans.use: to pay for her son's tuition fees.

loans.name: Shahriyor

texts.ru: Эго зовут Шахриёр. Ему 28 лет. Он семейный мужчина. Шахриёр работает таксистом. У него имеется машина марки Opel. На сегодняшний день услуга такси является основным источником дохода. Шахриёр хочет начать новую деятельность в сфере животноводства. Он живет на районе Гиссар. В Гиссаре приятный климат и неповторимая природа. Такой климат прекрасно способствует для деятельностей животноводства и растениеводства. У Шахриёра имеется опыт и навыки в этой сфере деятельности и Шахриер хочет использовать их в бизнесе. Он очень сильно старается начать новую деятельность, потому что он получить постоянную работу и определенный источник дохода, что поможет улучшить жизненные и жилищные условия его семьи. Чтобы начать бизнес ему необходимо купить несколько скотов, на денный момент у него только одна корова. Для приобретения скотов он просит кредит, с надеждой, что его бизнес получит успех.
texts.en:
His name is Shahriyor, and he is 28 years old. He is a family man who works as a taxi driver with an Opel car. His main source of income is from his taxi business. He would like to start a new business in the field of cattle breeding. 

Shahriyor lives in Gissar, which has a nice climate and unique natural environment. The climate is perfect for livestock and crops. He has experience and skills in these fields and would like to use them in his business. 

Shahriyor very much wants to start a new operation because it would offer regular work and a good source of income to help improve his family's living conditions. In order to start this new business, he needs to buy a few cattle--he only has one now. He is asking for a loan to buy the cattle and hopes that his business will be successful.

loans.use: to buy cattle and start a new business.

loans.name: Huong

texts.en:
Huong is 46 years old and widowed with children. She lives with her family in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. Huong runs a sewing shop for earning a living. 

She started her business 20 years ago. She intends to take a loan to gradually expand her business by repairing her sewing shop and buying sewing materials; she will also use a part of loan for paying her daughter's school fees.  

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To pay school fees for her child, buy sewing materials and repair her sewing shop.

loans.name: Shinekhuu

texts.en:
Mr. Shinekhuu, 27 years old, lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been rendering taxi service to local people since 2012. Before this, he used to sell second-hand mobile phones at a trade center. His wife is currently undertaking training in becoming a kindergarten teacher. Their elder child goes to elementary school, while the younger one stays at kindergarten. 

Last year, he bought an electric car from his friend, and the due date is near, but he does not have enough cash for repayment. So, he is requesting a loan of 7,000,000 MNT (Mongolian tugriks) to pay the remaining fee of his electric car. The advantage of the electric car is that it wastes less fuel and emits harmless pollutants. Currently, this car is his family's main income generator.

loans.use: to pay the remaining fee for his electric car

loans.name: Eshmurod

texts.ru: Эшмурод 29 летний женатый мужчина из района Шахритус. Шахритус находится на юго-западной части страны. На районе благоприятный климат, чистый воздух и неповторимая природа, что является причиной, по которой сельскохозяйственные деятельности столь популярны. Эшмурод занимается земледелием, выращивает сельскохозяйственные культуры. Эшмурод решил дополнительно заняться животноводством. Эшмурод ответственный и серьезный семьянин. Он так же ответственно относится обоснованию нового бизнеса. На данный момент у Эшмурода имеется корм и 2 коровы, но это количество не для данного бизнеса. Он просит кредит, чтобы купить несколько скота. С помощью кредита он приобретет скотов, начнет новую деятельность и у его семьи появиться новые экономические возможности.
texts.en: Eshmurod is a 29-year-old married man from the Shahrituz region, which is located in the south-west part of the country. The area has a favourable climate, clean air and beautiful natural surroundings, reasons for which farming is so popular. Eshmurod works in agriculture, growing crops, and has decided to add animal husbandry to his business activities. He is a responsible and serious family man and is working hard toward the founding of his new business. Eshmurod currently has feed and two cows, but it's not enough for the needs of the business. He is requesting a loan to buy some cattle. With the help of a loan he will acquire livestock, begin a new livelihood and improve his family's economic possibilities.

loans.use: to buy livestock to start a new business

loans.name: Lina`

texts.en:
Lina, 37 years of age, is married to a farmer and blessed with six children. She's been into vegetable production business for almost one year, and earning a net income of PHP 100 daily. Her daily profits are usually spent on their food and school allowances of their children. 

Due to lack of capital to run her business, she would like to avail a loan amounting to PHP 11,000 to purchase seedlings of string beans, bitter gourd, egg plant, and squash for her vegetable production business. She's hoping that her business will continue to improve and become more profitable.

loans.use: to purchase seedlings of string beans, bitter gourd, egg plant, and squash for her vegetable production business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy groceries

loans.name: Amy

texts.en:
This is Amy, 41, resident of Bacoor, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Carlos, an employee, and they have children. She and her husband manage their household as they do their respective jobs. They are helping each other in generating income for their family.

Amy operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is a retail store that sells inexpensive items, often with a single price for all items in the store. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a PHP 5 worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 500 in sales every day.

She is requesting a PHP 10,000 loan to help her continue the operation of her business. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries, and beverages to expand her product inventory.

Amy dreams that her business will continue to flourish and hopes to give her children a good life and education. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week, and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en:
Leonida is 42 years of age, married, and blessed with four children. She has owned and operated a food stall inside a school campus for almost ten years. Leonida earns a net income of 200 PHP a day. Her daily profits are usually spent on the school allowances for her children. 

Due to insufficient funds, she would like to use a loan of 25,000 PHP to purchase sugar, fish sauce, powdered juice, cooking oil, and beverages for her food stall. She's hoping that her requested loan will be granted so that her business will continue to improve and become more profitable.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, fish sauce, powdered juice, cooking oil, and beverages for her food stall.

loans.name: Chi Macar Group

texts.es:
La señora Santos Victoriana es casada. De edad 54 años. No tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar. Tiene 8 hijos y de ellos 1 está estudiando. Se dedica a la crianza de pollos. Inición este  negocio con la ayuda de su esposo y a la fecha lleva 21 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de pollos para engordarlos y luego venderlos. En el futuro desea tener una granja con diversos animales de corral.

Los demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a la crianza de animales domésticos y al comercio.
texts.en:
Santos Victoriana is 54 years old and married. She did not have the opportunity to go to school. She has eight children, one of whom is going to school. She works raising chickens. She started this business with the help of her husband, and she now has 21 years of experience in it.

Santos Victoriana is the organizer of this group. She is requesting this loan to buy chicks to raise and fatten and then sell. In the future she would like to have a farm with a variety of farmyard animals.

The other members of the group work raising domesticated animals and in sales.

loans.use: to buy chicks to raise and fatten and then sell.

loans.name: Le

texts.en: Le is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages, to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business, and offer her customers a greater variety of products. She hopes that her new loan will assist her to increase the size of her store, increase sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety and quantity of products to stock in her general store.

loans.name: M. Irshad

texts.en:
M. Irshad is a 56-year-old married man; he is living along with his spouse and five children in the area of Sahiwal, Pakistan. He owns a shop in which he sells gas cylinders and burners in his community. He buys these cylinders from manufacturers on order and sells them from his shop. 

He has been running this enterprise for three years and is getting a lot of experience in this business. He is the sole earner for his entire family and is cherishing alone his children. He does not have any other source of income except this shop. Because of the rapid increase in household expenses and with the growth of his children, he wants to grow his income as well. In fact, he wants to provide higher education to his children. This seems impossible in the absence of a healthy income. 

His current business proved insufficient for generating the desired income to meet household expenses and to bear the educational expenses of his children. He wants to grow his business so he could prove himself a good father by providing a better living standard and higher education to his children. However, he is unable to grow his business without some capital.

Therefore, M. Irshad has requested a Kiva loan through BRAC Pakistan so he can buy more burners, ovens, cylinders, etc. for reselling. 

He hopes that this loan will prove productive and beneficial for his business as well as for his family. M. Irshad thanks Kiva, honorable lenders and BRAC Pakistan for this honorable support.

loans.use: to buy more burners, ovens and gas cylinders for resale.

loans.name: Hien

texts.en:
Hien is 59 years old and widowed with two children. She lives with her family in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. She has been running a general store to earn a living. 

Hien started her business five years ago. She intends to take a loan to gradually expand her business by buying a variety of different products such as soft drinks and snack food to sell to her customers. She hopes her business will run smoothly and help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to gradually expand her business by buying a variety of different products such as soft drinks and snack food to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Jamalbubu

texts.ru: Жамалбубу 67 лет, замужем, многодетные и счастливые родители 8 детей. Жамалбубу и ее супруг на пенсии, это люди любящие порядок, чистоту и уют. Дети все взрослые, проживают самостоятельно. У Жамалбубу - среднее образование, по характеру Жамалбубу очень ответственная, общительная, жизнерадостная. Вместе с мужем Жамалбубу занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 21 год назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Жамалбубу, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 5 дойных коров, 2 лошади, 10 коз и 10 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 12,000 сом (KGS) от реализации молока, также обрабатывает 4,30 ГА земли, где в основном выращивает -пшеницу, ячмень и картофель. Полученный урожай реализуют оптовым поставщикам. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Жамалбубу обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум"  за кредитом - на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Летом скот будет под присмотром пастуха. Доходы от кредита Жамалбубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Jamalbubu is 67 years old and married. She and her husband are happy parents of eight children. Jamalbubu and her husband are retired.  Their home is orderly, clean and cozy. Their children are all grown up and live separately. Jamalbubu has received secondary education. By nature she is very responsive, communicative, optimistic. Together with her husband, Jamalbubu raises livestock and grows produce having stated 21 years ago by buying livestock for 10,000 KGS. Thanks to Jamalbubu's hard work, her farm now includes five dairy cows, two horses, 10 goats and 10 sheep. Her monthly income from selling milk is 12,000 KGS. Jamalbubu also works 4.3 ha [10.6 acres] of land, where she main grows wheat, barley and potatoes. She sells her harvested produce to wholesalers. In order to develop her farm further, Jamalbubu has applied to the Bai Tushum microfinance institution for a loan to increase her livestock headcount by buying sheep. In the summer, they will have a shepherd take care of the animals. Jamalbubu plans to use the resulting income for an additional livestock increase. She also plan to save up for house renovations.

loans.use: to buy sheep.

loans.name: Nhung

texts.en: Nhung is requesting a new loan to buy a better quality and variety of products such as soft drinks, cup cakes, and travel-sized shampoos to stock her store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products. She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increase sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a better quality and variety of products such as soft drinks, cup cakes, and travel-sized shampoos.

loans.name: Hoa

texts.en: Hoa is requesting a new loan to buy a variety of new products, such as food and beverages to restock her general store. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products. She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and increase sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a variety of new products, such as food and beverages to restock her general store.

loans.name: Gerardo De Jesús

texts.es:
Gerardo es un hombre carismático y emprendedor que, a sus 45 años de edad, se dedica a producir y comercializar obleas, oficio que aprendió de su padrastro y que, hoy en día alterna con su empleo como oficial de construcción, para complementar los ingresos con los cuales solventa los gastos familiares.
Con el propósito de fortalecer su negocio, se motiva para solicitar el crédito como apoyo, con el dinero comprará materia prima al por mayor (harina de trigo, leche y azúcar) y reparará la máquina cortadora, con esto podrá aumentar su producción y optimizar el tiempo de trabajo, logrando mejorar las ventas e ingresos.
Gerardo, con su espíritu emprendedor y tenacidad, lucha cada día para cumplir los objetivos que se propone y, ahora tiene como prioridad, fortalecer y ampliar su negocio, para expandir su mercado, generar oportunidades de empleo y mejorar las condiciones de vida y bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Gerardo is a charismatic and enterprising man who, at age 45, is dedicated to producing and selling wafer cookies, a craft he learned from his stepfather. He does this work as a supplement to his work as a construction worker in order to bring in more income for household expenses.

In order to strengthen his business, he has been encouraged to apply for a loan to support it. He will purchase the raw ingredients in bulk such as wheat flour, milk, and sugar. He will also repair the cutting machine so that he can increase production and optimize his working time to improve sales and profits. 

Gerardo, with his entrepreneurial spirit and tenacity, works hard every day to meet his goals. To strengthen and grow his business is now a priority. He wants to expand his market, generate employment opportunities, and improve the living conditions and well-being of his family.

loans.use: to buy wheat flour, milk, and sugar for his wafer cookie making business.

loans.name: Firuza

texts.ru:
Фируза трудолюбивая и ответственная женщина. Она была  замужем, но недавно она развелась со своим мужем и сейчас живёт одна и воспитывает двоих детей. Фируза со своими детьми живёт в маленьком посёлке. Она очень любит своих детей и старается дать им всё необходимое для того, чтобы они могли расти, развиваться и реализовывать себя в обществе. Для этого Фируза занимается своим бизнесом, чтобы иметь постоянный доход. 

Фируза занимается животноводством, этот бизнес она начала несколько лет назад и по сей день старается расширять его. Она закупает скот, затем выращивает их и продаёт полученное от скота молоко  и мясо. Для того, чтобы пасти скот рядом с домом Фирузы имеется небольшое поле. Поэтому ей очень удобно заниматься этим видом бизнеса. На сегодня у Фирузы имеются несколько голов скота, которых она будет уже продавать. Поэтому ей необходимо закупить сейчас ещё несколько голов скота, чтобы начать их вскармливать. Но так как у Фирузы не имеется достаточно финансов, она обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Фируза очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Firuza is a hard-working and responsible woman. She was married, but recently divorced her husband. She now lives alone in a small village with her two children. She loves her children very much and tries to give them everything they need to grow up, mature and realize their potential in society. This is why Firuza works for a steady income.

Firuza raises livestock for a living. She started a business a few years ago and is currently trying to expand. She buys cattle to raise and then sells milk and meat. She has a small field near her house for grazing the cattle, which makes it a very convenient business for her. Firuza currently has a few head of cattle that she will sell, so she will need to buy more animals and start raising them. She does not have enough money, so she applied for a loan with Arvand to buy more cattle. Firuza is hoping for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.es:
Gabriel es un cliente de Kubo Financiero y esta es su historia.
Soy Gabriel, tengo 24 años y trabajo en una startup de tecnología la cual cambia el proceso de aprendizaje dentro de las escuelas por medio de una plataforma educativa. Estoy convencido que la educación es una variable de cambio importante para el desarrollo de nuestro país, mi startup al ser una plataforma vía internet a impactado a miles de usuarios mejorando la calidad educativa de la comunidad estudiantil y docente.
Estoy pidiendo el prestamos, porqué recien llegó un nuevo bebé a la familia y nos falta la última parte de detalles en la construcción de el nuevo espacio para mis 2 hijos.
texts.en:
Gabriel is a client of Kubo.financiero and this is his story:

“My name is Gabriel, I’m 24 years old and I work in a technology startup that changes the process of learning in the schools through an educational platform. I am convinced that education is an important agent of change for the development of our country. Because my startup is an internet platform, it has had an impact on thousands of users, improving the quality of education for both students and teachers.

I am requesting this loan because we have a new baby in my family and we need to buy the last of the finishings for the construction of a new space for my two children.”

loans.use: to buy the last of the finishings for the construction of a new space for his two children.

loans.name: Erdenedelger

texts.en: Mrs. Erdenedelger is 40 years old, and lives with her family in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. She has been selling secondhand clothes to local people at the outdoor market for about ten years. Her husband has a position of technician at the power station. Using her previous loan, she has renovated her house by insulating walls and repairing the roof. Now she is requesting a loan of 3,000,000 MNT to install vacuum insulated windows, hardwood floors and a low-pressure heater in her house. By doing so, this will greatly reduce the heat loss through windows and floors, and reduce the consumption of coal her family uses for heating. Reduced coal usage means fewer pollutants in atmosphere.

loans.use: to buy vacuum insulated windows, hardwood floors, and low-pressure heater for her house.

loans.name: Then

texts.en:
Then is requesting a new loan to buy a variety of new products to restock her general store such as rice, sugar, and beverages. This purchase will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. 

Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products. She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store and boosting sales, and will also help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a variety of new products to restock her general store such as rice, sugar, and beverages.

loans.name: Thu

texts.en:
Thu is a 55-year-old married woman. She lives with her four children and husband in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns money as a contractor of construction. For one year, she has run a business of selling soft drinks to people in her community.

Thu would like a loan to purchase better quality food to sell to her customers. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her customers, and attract additional customers. 

She also hopes that through her loan, she will be able to increase her income and save money for any future difficulties facing her family.

loans.use: to purchase better quality food to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Phuong

texts.en: Phuong, 45, is single and lives in Ho Chi Minh City. She earns a living running a beauty shop. She started  this business to cover her expenses and to generate income. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying more haircare products and accessories to stock her shop. She hopes that this will enable her to attract more customers, and that she will be able to increase the turnover of her business. She hopes that through the loan she will be able to expand her business activities, and have money to reinvest into her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy haircare products and accessories to stock her shop.

loans.name: Sobeida

texts.es:
Sobeida tiene 43 años y vive en un sector muy humilde de San Lorenzo tiene un hijo varón y tres mujeres y  en ocasiones cuida de sus nietos.
Sobeida se dedica actualmente a vender carne ahumada, costillas de cerdo y embutidos, en ocasiones trabaja en las minas de oro para ayudarse económicamente y así darle mejores días a su familia y pagar puntualmente el crédito.
Desde hace 8 años, Sobeida realiza estas actividades y ha logrado que sus hijos estudien en la escuela, ella espera con este crédito, comprar más carnes y costillas para aumentar sus ingresos atendiendo a más clientes.
Cabe indicar que su mercadería (carnes y costillas) la trae desde Colombia y es garantizado su sabor y calidad, esta es la razón por la que sus clientes la prefieren.
Desde ya agradece a los socios de KIVA por el apoyo que brindan a los sectores con vulnerabilidad
texts.en:
Sobeida is 43 years old and lives in a very humble area of San Lorenzo. She has one son and three daughters and ocassionally takes care of her grandchildren.

Sobeida dedicates herself to selling smoked meat, pork ribs and sausage and sometimes she also works in the gold mines to help her financial situation, improve her family's day to day and pay her loan repayments on time.

For the last 8 years, Sobeida has carried out this activity and made sure her children stayed in school. She hopes that with this loan she can buy more meat and ribs to increase her revenue and see more customers.

It should be noted that her products (meats and ribs) come from Columbia and their taste and quality is guaranteed, which is why her clients prefer her to other vendors.

Sobeida would like to thank Kiva lenders for the support they provide to vulnerable sectors.

loans.use: buy more meat and ribs to increase her revenue

loans.name: Be

texts.en:
Be would like to take a further loan to buy materials to make doors and windows. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attract new customers and increase sales. 

She also hopes that through the loan, she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more materials to increase her production of doors and windows.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es: Yolanda es una mujer de 27 años, luchadora y dinámica, vive en Borbón, Esmeraldas, ella cuida de una niña de 13 años, hija de su cuñada la cual falleció, ahora la considera como su hija a quien cuida todos los días. Se dedica a la comercialización de ropa de toda variedad para dama, caballero y niños,  inicio con este negocio vendiendo ropa que ella ya no usaba, como tuvo buenos ingresos al hacerlo, empezó a comprar y vender ropa a domicilio en las zonas rurales de Borbón. Sus clientes le hacen pedidos los cuales ella atiende de inmediato. En esta zona no existe ningún negocio similar al que realiza ella, ya que todos los negocios que se dedican a vender ropa lo hacen en la zona comercial de Borbón.  Con el préstamo piensa adecuar el espacio de su casa para almacenar la mercadería, su mayor anhelo es tener su propio local donde pueda vender gran variedad de ropa.
texts.en:
Yolanda is a 27 year old woman who is dynamic and a fighter. She lives in Borbón, Esmeraldas, and looks after a 13 year old girl - the daughter of her sister-in-law who passed away - who she now considers her own daughter.

She buys and sells clothes of all types for women, men and children. She started her business by selling clothes that she didn't wear and as she made a good income from this, she started to buy and sell clothes door-to-door in the rural areas of Borbón. Her clients make requests which she tends to immediately. In this area there is no other similar businesses to hers, as all the other clothes selling businesses are in the commercial area of Borbón.

With this loan she plans to alter her home to be able to store her products and her biggest desire is to have her own establishment from where she can sell a large range of clothing.

loans.use: alter her home to be able to stock her products

loans.name: Munkhchimeg

texts.en:
Mrs. Munkhchimeg, 32 years old, lives with her family in Kherlen, easternmost town of Mongolia. She has been working as a cook at a newly launched restaurant. Before this job, she used to be a pizza maker. Her husband does building work, such as decorating interior parts of building and renovating buildings. 

The house her family lives in has been deteriorating over the years and it needs some repair. So she is requesting a loan of 1,500,000 MNT to buy building materials, such as bricks, cements, fiberglass and foam for house renovation. As a result, her family will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned for heating and then less pollutants are released into air. 

The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for better future.

loans.use: to buy building materials, such as bricks, cements, fiberglass and foam for house renovations.

loans.name: Jecinta

texts.en:
Jecinta is 38 years old and has a retail shop. She is married and together with her spouse, they have been blessed with three children. She has been in this business for seven years now, and it has been profitable. Her monthly income is KES 20,000.

She plans to use this loan to pay school fees for her children. 

She will use the anticipated income from her retail business to buy a plot of land. This is her sixth loan term with VisionFund Kenya, and she has been repaying her previous loans successfully. 

In the future, Jecinta hopes to educate her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Bay

texts.en:
Bay is requesting a new loan to buy more kinds of products to sell at her store, such as beverages, instant noodles, and bags of sugar and coffee.

Her previous loan enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attract new customers and increase her sales. 

She also hopes that through the loan, she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy many kinds of basic products to restock her general store.

loans.name: Trang

texts.en:
Trang is 48 years old and married with two children. She lives with her family in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband is a bus driver. She runs a general store to earn a living. 

She started her business one year ago. She intends to take a loan to gradually expand her business by buying a variety of different products to sell to her customers such as soft drinks, sugar, and sanitary items. She hopes her business will run smoothly and will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to gradually expand her business by buying a variety of different products to sell to her customers such as soft drinks, sugar, and sanitary items.

loans.name: Sang

texts.en: Sang would like to take another loan to buy materials to make clothes to sell from her shop. Her previous loan enabled her to increase her sales, and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attract new customers, and increase sales. She also hopes that through the loan, she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy materials to make clothes for selling.

loans.name: Loan

texts.en:
Loan is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages, to restock her general store. This purchase will help her better meet the needs of her customers. Her previous loan enabled her to improve her business and offer her customers a greater variety of products.
She hopes that her new loan will assist her in increasing the size of her store, increase her sales, and help her improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy basic goods to restock her general store.

loans.name: Noomali

texts.en:
Noomali is a 32-year-old lady, married and a mother of three children. She is a farmer and has been farming her own piece of land for the last fifteen years. Noomali learned about VisionFund Kenya from women who are already registered members of the organization. This will be her sixth loan after paying back the previous loans successfully.

She plans to spend the loan amount to prepare land and buy planting seedlings and fertilizer for the maize farm. Due to the favorable climatic condition and fertile soil, the crop has proved to do very well. Also, the market is ready for both retail and wholesale buyers.

Nomaali hopes to use the profit from the proceeds of this loan to expand her family farming activity from small-scale to commercial farming. Her dream is do large-scale farming and have her own farm machinery.

loans.use: to pay for land cultivation and purchase farm inputs.

loans.name: Ly

texts.en:
Ly is 46 years old, and lives in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City with her family, including two children. Her husband works in the construction field. She earns an income running a general store in front of her house.  

She started this business four years ago. She sells sugar, toys for kids, soft drinks, yogurt and other household items to people in her community. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of products; in particular, foods and beverages, to stock her store and better satisfy her customers. She hopes her business runs smoothly, and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy beverages and food to stock her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials for his house.

loans.name: Petrona

texts.es: La señora Petrona tiene 48 años, ella se dedica  a  la elaboración y venta de quesos, ella vive en la localidad de Batallas, este préstamo es primero que tiene con la institución, la señora Petrona va a usar este préstamo para compra de un ganado lechero mejorado para tener una mejor producción de leche,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es mejorar sus ingresos, la señora Petrona enfrenta retos en su negocio que son mejorar su negocio y calidad de vida, la señora Petrona va a utilizar los beneficios mejorar sus ingresos y para compra de forraje para su ganado, la señora Petrona desea para su negocio crecer en la producción y venta de leche, Ella es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora con ganas de seguir adelante y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Petrona is 48 years old. She works making and selling cheese. She lives in the town of Batallas. This is the first loan that she has with the institution. Petrona is going to use this loan to purchase improved dairy cattle to have a better cheese production.

Her reason for requesting this loan is to improve her income. Petrona faces challenges in her business, which are to improve her business and quality of life. Petrona is going to use the benefits to improve her income and to purchase feed for her livestock. Petrona wishes for her business to grow in its production and milk sales. She is a hard-working and entrepreneurial person with wishes to move forward and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase dairy cattle.

loans.name: Le

texts.en:
Le is a 50-year-old married woman. She lives with her two children and husband in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns money as a worker for a construction company. For ten years, Le has run a business selling soft drinks to people in her community.

Le would like a loan to purchase a better quality food to sell to her customers. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her customers and attract additional ones. She also hopes that through her loan she will be able to increase her income and save money for any future difficulties her family might face.

loans.use: to purchase a better quality food to sell for her customers

loans.name: Tu

texts.en:
Tu is 73 years old and is widowed with six children, two sons and four daughters. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. 

Tu has been running a shop selling soybean milk in front of her door for three years. She started this business to cover her family’s expenses. 

Tu is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying soybeans and sugar to increase her sales. She hopes that this will enable her to attract more customers and that she will be able to increase the turnover of her business.

loans.use: to buy soy beans and sugar to make and sell soy milk.

loans.name: Bold

texts.en:
Bold, 32 years old, lives with his wife and son in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been rendering taxi services to local people for three years and has accumulated experience in picking up customers and driving them quickly to their destination. His wife sells casual clothes at the trade center by renting a stall. 

Using his previous loan, he has made renovations to his house. Now he is requesting a loan in the amount of 1500000 MNT for the same purpose. He will use his loan to buy vacuum insulated windows and hardwood floors. Installing those items will greatly improve his family's living condition, reducing coal usage for heating and thus releasing fewer pollutants into air.

loans.use: to buy vacuum insulated windows and hardwood floors.

loans.name: Sonia Elcy

texts.es:
Sonia, a sus 52 años de edad, es madre soltera de 4 hijos a los que sacó adelante con mucho sacrificio, esfuerzo y dedicación. Lleva 22 años de su vida productiva trabajando como comerciante independiente, pues tiene una pequeña chaza que heredó tras la muerte de su padre, trabaja de lunes a sábado desde las primeras horas de la mañana con el fin de aprovechar al máximo la ventaja de estar ubicada en una zona muy transitada del centro de la ciudad; así ha logrado sustentar los gastos familiares y brindar educación a todos sus hijos.
El crédito que solicita es un apoyo para fortalecer su negocio, pues requiere comprar surtido al por mayor (mecato, galletería, dulces, cigarrillos) y además otro equipo celular para vender minutos; esto le permitirá prestar un mejor servicio a sus clientes y satisfacer los diversos gustos, logrando aumentar las ventas y los ingresos que percibe.
Sonia manifiesta que la principal motivación para seguir luchando, es poder tener la capacidad para adquirir una casa propia, en la que pueda disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar en compañía de sus seres amados.
texts.en:
Sonia is 52 years old, a single mother of 4 children who she has moved forward with much sacrifice, efforts, and dedication. She has spent 22 years of her productive life working as an independent businesswoman. She has a small cart which she inherited after the death of her father. She works from Mondays to Saturdays starting at early hours in the morning, with the goal of taking advantage to the maximum of the advantage of being located in the center of the city, where many people transit through. In this way, she has been able to cover the family expenses and provide education to all of her children. 

The loan that she is requesting is a support to strengthen her business. She needs to buy merchandise in bulk (cakes, cookies, candy, and cigarettes) and other equipment to sell cell phone minutes. This will allow her to give better service to her customers and satisfy the diverse tastes, thereby increasing her sales and the income she receives. Sonia comments that the principal motivation to continue fighting is to be able to have the capacity to acquire her own house, in which she can enjoy a better quality of life and well-being in the company of her loved ones.

loans.use: to buy merchandise in bulk (cakes, cookies, candy, and cigarettes) and other equipment to sell cell phone minutes.

loans.name: Victor Romano

texts.es: El Señor  Victor tiene 29 años,  él se dedica a la confección de prendas de vestir, tiene su taller en la localidad de Huayrocondo,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, el Señor  Victor  va a usar este préstamo para la compra de una maquina de coser ya que le hace falta en su taller, su razón para solicitar es que tiene muchos pedidos que con dos maquinas que tiene no puede completar el pedido,  el Señor  Victor enfrenta retos en su negocio que son mejorar la calidad de sus prendas de vestir,  va a utilizar los beneficios en comprar de tela  para la realización de su trabajo, el Señor  Victor es una persona con ganas de seguir adelante se siente feliz por esta oportunidad que le brindan para mejorar su negocio y por ende sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Victor is 29 years old and his career is making clothing. He has a workshop in the locality of Huayrocondo. This is his first loan sequence with this loaning institution. Victor is going to use the loan in order to purchase a sewing machine that he is in need of in his workshop. He needs the sewing machine because he gets a lot of requests and with only two sewing machines he cannot complete all the orders. Victor is working on improving aspects of his business like the quality of his garments. He is going to use his earnings to purchase fabric in order to make more clothing items. Victor is a person who wants to get ahead and he is happy for this opportunity that will give him the chance to improve his business and also earn more.

loans.use: purchase a sewing machine.

loans.name: Ngoc

texts.en: Ngoc, 33, lives in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City with her family, including three daughters and her husband. Ngoc and her husband earn money through their business selling aluminum products. Ngoc is sometimes unable to provide different kinds of products for her customers. Consequently she would like to get a loan to buy a larger stock of products to meet her customers' needs. She also hopes her business will ensure that her family members, and especially her children, will have a better education and a better future.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of aluminum products for selling at her store.

loans.name: Thiện

texts.en:
Thiện, a 35-year-old married mother of two, lives and works in Nong Cong district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province. Thiện has been growing rice and raising poultry and cattle for more than 10 years. Her main business hardship is a lack of capital. 

Thiện is requesting a loan to purchase materials to build a toilet and pay for a water pipeline, an electricity line, washbasin, septic toilet seat, etc. She and her family are currently using unhygienic latrines.

Thiện recently joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her family's living conditions, and this will be her first loan. With her business profits, Thiện hopes to remodel her house and buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase materials to build a toilet and pay for a water pipeline, an electricity line, washbasin, septic toilet seat, etc.

loans.name: Silbio Antonio

texts.es: El señor Silvio ha trabajado la tierra desde muy joven gracias a la enseñanza de sus padres, su esposa lo apoya incondicionalmente, actualmentge tiene 2 manzanas de Piña cultivada y 1/2 de Platanos los cuales requieren de cuido y mantenimiento, el credito lo solicita para la compra de fertilizantes como Urea, Completo, Bayfolan, Biogrip, etc. asi podra evitar que las plagas llegen a sus cultivos. Agradece el apoyo que se le ha brindado.
texts.en:
Silvio has worked the land since he was very young thanks to his parents’ instruction. His wife supports him unconditionally. Currently he is cultivating 14,000 square meters of pineapple and 3500 square meters of bananas, which require care and maintenance. 

He is requesting the loan to purchase fertilizers such as urea, Completo, Bayfolan, Biogrip, etc., and therefore be able to prevent pests from appearing in his crops. He is thankful for the support that they have provided to him.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Sokun's Group

texts.en:
Residing in a rural village in the Moungkul Borey district of Banteay Meanchey province, Sokun is 60 years old and widowed. She has five children. To support the family, she has been working as a tailor and making snacks to better feed her family. The current business earns her about 50,000KHR per day to support her family.
 
Sokun has been a member of Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, for three cycles already and she successfully used the past loans to better support her family to have sufficient food. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy materials to  support her tailoring business and to buy ingredients for making snacks. She hopes this loan will help her to earn more income from her current businesses.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making snacks

loans.name: Soern's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village in the Memot district of Kampong Cham province, Soern is a 43-year-old married father of two children. Cassava planting has been the main source of his family’s income for 23 years. Together, they can earn about 30,000KHR per day to meet family’s needs and manage to save about 13,000KHR each day for future needs.

Soern has been with VisionFund for three cycles while his group member has been with VisionFund for one cycle. Soern completely paid back his previous loan. Now he is leading his group to ask for a loan. As the leader, he is going to use his portion to buy pesticides and seeds for his farmland. He hopes to grow more crops on his farmland.

loans.use: to buy pesticides and seeds for his farmland

loans.name: Orn's Group

texts.en:
Orn is 27 years old and married. She lives with her family in a rural area, located in the Memot district of Kampong Cham province. She has one son to take care of. 

Cassava and rubber planting are the only primary sources of her family’s income to make a living and Orn has been in these businesses for two years. With the current business, she can earn approximately KHR 54,000 per day and save about KHR 20,000 each day for future needs. 

Orn has been with VisionFund Cambodia for two cycles and she has completely paid back the past loans, which have helped her to better support her family. Now, she is leading her group to request a loan. 

As the leader, Orn is going to use her portion to plow the field and she will use a portion of it to spend on labor. With this loan, she hopes to cultivate her rice, to earn more income, to improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to plow her field and pay for labor.

loans.name: Zina

texts.ru: Зине 62 года, вдова, одна воспитала 5 детей. Все дети женаты и проживают отдельно со своими семьями, самый младший сын проживает с Зиной и помогает ей по хозяйству. У Зины - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Зина занимается животноводством, стартовав 14 лет назад, с покупки скота на 25,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Зины, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 6 дойных коров, 30 овец, 5 коз. Хозяйство развивается стабильно, имеют большой сарай и все необходимые условия для содержания и разведения скота. Заготовлено 500 снопов кукурузы, 600 снопов клевера, 1 тонна кукурузы. Ежемесячный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Зина обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку нетелей для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Зина планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку участка для строительства нового дома и нового помещения для скота.
texts.en:
Zina is 62 years old and a widow.  She raised 5 children, all of whom are married and live in their own homes with their own families.  Zina's youngest son lives with her and helps her with her business.  Zina has a secondary level education and the main source of her family's income is from the animal husbandry business she started 14 years ago with the purchase of 25,000 som (KGS) worth of cattle.  As a result of Zina's hard work, today she has 6 milking cows, 30 sheep, and 5 goats.   Her cattle farm is developing along a stable path.   She has a large barn and all the necessary things for keeping and breeding cattle.  She has stored up 500 bundles of corn on the stalk, 600 of clover, and a ton of corn.  Her monthly income amounts to 15,000 som (KGS).

With an aim to further developing her business, Zina applied to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan for the purchase of heifers in order to increase the size of her herd.  She plans to invest the profits from her loan in further increasing the size of her herd, and to save up money to buy a plot of land where she can build a new house as well as a barn for the cattle.

loans.use: to buy heifers

loans.name: Skarlethe Surima
