texts.es: La señora, Skarlethe, casada madre de un hijo en edad escolar, ella labora como enfermera en un hospital y su esposo es docente de un colegio publico, entre los dos luchan para salir adelante, el credito lo solicita para comprar Cosmeticos y accesorios para dama ademas compra Plata para comercializarla, Agradece la confianza y apoyo con este credito ya que sus ganancias aumentaran y  sus condicones familiares mejoraran
texts.en:
Skarlethe is married and the mother of one school-aged boy.  She works as a nurse in a hospital and her husband is a staff member of a public high school. They work as a team to get ahead.

Skarlethe is requesting this loan to buy cosmetics and accessories for women, as well as gold that she can sell. She is very grateful for the trust and support this loan brings. It will help her increase her income and her family's circumstances will improve.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and accessories.

loans.name: Juldus

texts.ru: Жулдус 43 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. Двое старших детей-студенты, остальные -школьники. Супруг -фермер с большим опытом. У Жулдус - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Жулдус занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Жулдус, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 39 овец. Все условия для содержания скота имеются. Корма и сено заготовлены. Жулдус также имеет небольшой земельный надел мерою 1,0 ГА, на котором ежегодно сажает фасоль, перец и картофель для внутрихозяйственного использования и реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет 13,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Жулдус обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом - на покупку бычков для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Жулдус планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на покупку бытовой техники.
texts.en:
Juldus is 43 years old, married, and she and her husband are raising 5 children.  The two eldest are university students and the rest are still in school.  Juldus's husband is a farmer with a great deal of experience.  Juldus has a secondary level education.  Her family's main source of income is the animal husbandry business she started 20 years ago with the purchase of 5,000 som (KGS) worth of cattle.  As a result of her hard work, today Juldus has one milk cow and 39 sheep.  She has everything necessary for raising cattle.  She has feed and hay at the ready.  Juldus also has a large, 1 HA plot of land where every year she grows beans, peppers, and potatoes.  She sells some of the vegetables and uses the rest at home.  Her monthly income amounts to 13,000 som (KGS).

With an aim to further developing her business, Juldus applied to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan to buy steers in order to increase the size of her herd.  Juldus plans to invest the profits from the loan in further increasing the size of her herd and in saving up money to buy home appliances.

loans.use: to buy steers

loans.name: Marcio Irene

texts.es: Marció Irene mayor de edad casado con un hijo menor de edad aún bajo su responsabilidad, originario del municipio de Chinandega ubicado en el occidente del país, Marció se caracteriza por ser un hombre trabajador, honesto y responsable con su obligaciones a pagar, se dedica a la compra y venta de mercadería en general como: productos plásticos, planchas, abanicos, licuadoras, cafeteras entre otros, sus compras las realiza en otro departamento del país, las cuales son al contado, inicia su negocio con capital propios, el desde muy temprano comienza su jornada diaria y la realiza de forma ambulante, el cual ofrece sus productos en diferentes municipios y comarcas del departamento de Chinandega, uno de sus sueños es poder ver terminado su  vivienda, el objetivo de este financiamiento es para invertir en la compra de mercadería en general como: productos plásticos, juegos de sabanas, licuadora entre otros encargos que tiene.
texts.en:
Marció Irene is married with one young son under his responsibility. He is from the municipality of Chinandega, located in the western part of the country. Marció is a hard-working, honest man who is very responsible with making repayments. He makes a living buying and selling general merchandise such as plastic items, irons, fans, blenders, coffeemakers, and other items. He buys his merchandise in another department of the country, for which he needs cash on hand. Marció started this business using his own funds. Every day he wakes up very early and sets out to sell his items door to door. He does this in various municipalities and regions of Chinandega department. One of his dreams is the be able to see his house finished. 

Marció is requesting this loan in order to invest in merchandise for his business such as plastic products, sheet sets, blenders, and other items to fill the orders he has.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise such as plastic products, sheet sets, irons, and other items.

loans.name: Oscar Arnoldo

texts.es:
En la fotografía aparece Oscar con su hijo.

Oscar es un hombre trabajador de 43 años de edad, por circunstancias de la vida no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, él está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, tienen un hijo que aún está muy pequeño para ir a la escuela, y nadie más depende de él.

Él toda su vida se ha dedicado al trabajo en la  agricultura, ya que su padre desde muy pequeño le enseñó a sembrar maíz, maicillo, frijoles, y algunas hortalizas, pero desde hace 6 años se dedica al negocio de compra de animales para reproducir y destazar, y además siembra 1 hectárea de maíz y una de frijol, su trabajo le queda a 10 metros de su casa.

Oscar está solicitando este crédito, pues necesita comprar ganado y reproducirlo ya que manifiesta que es un rubro que le genera muy buenos ingresos que le permiten sacar adelante a su familia.

Él sueña con que su negocio funcione de la mejor manera y le dé frutos para pagar la deuda, y con las ganancias ir ahorrando para comprar más animales y lograr montar una ganadería.
texts.en:
Oscar appears in the photograph with his son.

Oscar is a 43-year-old, hard-working man. Because of circumstances in his life, he did not have the opportunity to study. He is in a relationship, and his partner dedicates herself to house chores. They have a son who is still too small to go to school, and no one else depends on him.

All of his life, he has worked in agriculture since his father taught him to plant corn, sorghum, beans, and other vegetables when he was very young. However, since he was 6 years old he has worked in the purchase of animals to breed and butcher. He also sows 1 hectare of corn and one of beans. His work is 10 meters from his home.

Oscar is requesting this loan because he needs to purchase livestock and breed it since it seems that it is a line of work that generates a very good income for him and allows him to bring his family out ahead.

His dream is for his business to function in the best way and provide him earnings to pay the loan, and with the profits save up to purchase more animals to be able to begin a ranch.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Saro's Group

texts.en:
Aged 41 years, Saro is widowed and she lives with her family in a rural area, located in the Memot district of Kampong Cham province. She is a mother of four children. She earns a living through growing cassava and rubber. Having been in this business for ten years, Saro can earn about KHR 40,000 per day to support her family. 

Saro has been with VisionFund Cambodia for one cycle and she completely paid back the past loan. She is leading her group to ask for a loan. 

As the leader, Saro is going to use her portion to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland. She hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for her farmland.

loans.name: Sarorn's Group

texts.en:
Sarorn lives in a rural village in the Memot district of Kampong Cham province, Cambodia. She is 33 years old and married with two children. To support her family, she has been working as a farmer, growing cassava for four years. The current business earns her about 40,000 KHR per day to make a living and she saves 10,000 KHR each day after expenses. 

This is Sarorn’s group loan with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. She is now leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy household supplies for her family. She hopes this loan will enable her to have enough supplies for her family to use.

loans.use: to buy household supplies for her family

loans.name: Nurzada

texts.ru: Нурзаде 47 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Нурзады - средне-специальное образование, работает медсестрой в реабилитационном центре. По характеру Нурзада очень ответственная, общительная, жизнерадостная. Вместе с мужем Нурзада дополнительно занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 25 лет назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Нурзады, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 1 жеребенок лошадь, 8 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 13,000 сом (KGS) от реализации молока, также обрабатывает 2,5 ГА земли, где в основном выращивает -фасоль и картофель. Полученный урожай реализуют оптовым поставщикам. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Нурзада обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум"  за кредитом - на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. После закупки коров, они будут находиться в собственном хозяйстве. Летом скот будет под присмотром пастуха. Доходы от кредита Нурзада планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на образование детей.
texts.en:
Nurzada is 47 years old, married, and she and her husband are raising 4 children.  Nurzada has a specialized secondary level education and she works as a nurse in a rehabilitation center.  Nurzada is very responsible, sociable, and cheerful.  Additionally, Nurzada and her husband are in the business of animal husbandry and farming.  They started their business 25 years ago with the purchase of 5,000 som (KGS) worth of cattle.  As a result of Nurzada's hard work, today she has one milking cow, a foal, and 8 sheep.  Her monthly income amounts to 13,000 som (KGS) from the sale of milk.  She also works 2.5 HA of land where primarily she grows beans and potatoes.  They sell their harvests to wholesalers.  

With an aim to further developing the business, Nurzada applied to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan to buy cows in order to increase the size of her herd.  After their purchase, the cows will be kept at the farm.  During the summer, they will be out with a shepherd.  Nurzada plans to invest the profits from the loan in further increasing the size of her herd, and to save money for her children's educations.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Ivania De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Ivania de  23 años de edad, soltera sin hijos, es originaria de Leon, lugar que está ubicado en la zona de occidente del país. Ella se caracteriza  a pesar de su temprana edad, de ser responsable, trabajadora, con ganas de superación personal. Esta joven solamente pudo cursar la secundaria, no realizo estudios universitarios, lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos. Pero le gustaría estudiar, bionalis clínico.
Gracias a su esfuerzo y sus ganas de salir adelante, la forma que ella tiene para ganarse la vida y ayudar con los gastos del hogar es con una pulpería, es una pequeña tienda que vende productos comestibles en cantidades pequeñas como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, pan, detergente, jugos, leche, cuajada, fósforos, ella dedica a su negocio unas 12 horas diarias ofreciendo su producto. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra y venta de productos comestibles, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. Ivania agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
Ivania is 23 years old, single, and has no children.  She is originally from Leon, located in the western part of the country.  She is known, in spite of her young age, for being responsible, hardworking, and with the desire for self-improvement.  She was only able to attend high school, and not university due to a lack of financial resources, but she would have liked to study clinical bioanalysis.  

Thanks to her efforts and desire to get ahead, she earns her living and helps with the household expenses with a convenience store.  It is a small store that sells products in small quantities such as rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, detergent, juice, cheese curd, and matches.  She works at her store for 12 hours every day offering her products.  

She is requesting this loan to invest in working capital so that she can stock her business and earn more profits in the near future.  Ivania is grateful for the help that Kiva lenders provide to people with limited resources in poor countries like Nicaragua so that they can have a dignified source of work.

loans.use: to purchase items like rice, beans, sugar, milk, bread, detergent, juice, and matches.

loans.name: Sami's Group

texts.en:
Sami, 28, lives with her husband and two children in a rural village of the Memot district, Cambodia. To feed the family, Sami and her husband earn a living as farmers who have been growing cassava and rubber for five years. They earn about 95,500 KHR per day to spend on the family’s needs.

This is Sami’s group loan with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, and her group has three members who have been with VisionFund for one cycle. She and her members completely paid back the past loans with VisionFund and Sami has used the loans to improve her family’s livelihood. As the leader, she is leading her group to apply for another loan with VisionFund. Sami is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers for her family’s business and to pay for plowing the field. She hopes to increase her crop yields to generate more income to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her family’s business

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is 33 years old, married and supports a family of three. Her spouse Thomas helps in fending for the family too. 

She is into the clothing business in Kilibwoni served by Vision Fund Kenya's Kapsabet office. This has been her income-generating business for the last nine years and she earns an average monthly income of KES 50,000.

She plans to use the loan of KES 105,000 to purchase skirt suits for ladies and hand bags for her shop. Her dream is to purchase her own plot, build and make her family stable.

loans.use: to buy more skirt suits and hand bags to sell

loans.name: Enn

texts.en:
Enn is a 54-year-old mother of five children, living in a rural village of the Koh Sotin district, Cambodia. Out of her five children, she still has one child who is  in school. 

To make a living, Enn and her husband have been farming rice and weaving mats for almost 30 years. The current business earns her about USD 13 per day to meet the family’s needs. 

Enn is just with VisionFund Cambodia this cycle. Now, she is applying for a loan. Enn will use her loan to pay for her son’s university fees to study law. She hopes to keep him there until his graduation.

loans.use: to pay for her son’s university fees to study law.

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Koh Sotin District

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies at wholesale prices, such as potatoes, plantains, disposable plates, sauces and oil, and to repair her cart, which is in very bad condition.

loans.name: Ologolimot

texts.en:
Ologolimot is 35 years old, married to Nalangu, and supporting a family of ten members. 

For the last ten years, Ologolimot has been in farming activities, which he does on his own piece of land. He earns a good income. Maize has proved to be doing well in his area, due to good climatic conditions and fertile soil.

Ologolimot learned about VisionFund Kenya through posters. This will be his fifth loan. He plans to buy farm inputs and to hire machinery for preparation of the land.  With the profits he hopes to make from the proceeds of this loan, he plans to re-invest in the farm and plant more acres of maize.

His future dreams are that he will be able to buy a bigger piece of land, plant more wheat for commercial farming, buy his own farm machinery, and educate his children. Ologolimot is a hard-working man who is focused on his goals.

loans.use: to pay for land cultivation and to purchase plant seedlings.

loans.name: Leam

texts.en:
Originally from a village of the Dambae district where farming is a common way to make a living, Leam is a 42-year-old mother of three children. Cassava planting and pig-raising are the main sources of family’s income which she and her husband have been in for 20 years. She can earn about KHR 90,000 per day, but she can manage to save about KHR 30,000 each day, after daily expenses. 

Leam has been with VisionFund Cambodia for three cycles and she completely paid back the past loans. She is now applying for a loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland and to buy pig feed. She hopes to make more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her farmland.

loans.name: Germahín Antonio

texts.es:
Germahín tiene 35 años de edad, estudió hasta 3 grado en la escuela, actualmente está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene 3 hijos y todos viven juntos en casa.

Él se ha dedicado al trabajo de campo a lo largo de toda su vida, actividad que aprendió por uno de sus tíos que se dedicaba a las labores agrícolas, actualmente siembra una hectárea de frijol y una de maíz, para llegar al terreno donde hace la siembra, debe hacer un largo recorrido de 45 minutos.

Germahín necesita de este crédito, para comprar chivas y reproducirlas, pues ha visto que es un negocio muy rentable, y no puede dejar de esforzarse para sacar adelante a su familia.

Él sueña con que la inversión en los animales, le generen más ganancias, ir reproduciéndolos para luego destazarlos y de esta manera no le falte dinero para invertir en las gastos de las necesidades básicas de su familia.
texts.en:
Germahín is 35 years old. He studied until the 3rd grade in school. Currently, he is in a relationship and his partner makes a living through domestic work. They have 3 children and they all live together at home.

He has made a living through farm work all of his life, an activity that he learned from one of his uncles that made a living through agricultural work. Currently, he sows a hectare of beans and one of corn. To get to the land that he cultivates he has to make a long, 45-minute walk.

Germahín needs this loan to purchase goats and breed them. He has seen that this is a very profitable business, and he cannot quit toiling to bring his family out ahead.

He dreams that this investment in animals will generate more profits, and to breed them to then butcher them. This way, he will have enough money to invest in the expenses of his family's basic necessities.

loans.use: to purchase goats.

loans.name: Sreang

texts.en:
Living in a rural village of the Dambae district, Sreang is 34 years old and married, with two children. The main source of the family’s income is from selling grocery items. She and her husband have been in this business for 14 years. 

Sreang is just with VisionFund Cambodia for this cycle and now she is applying for a loan. She wants to use her loan to buy more grocery items to resell. She hopes to make more income to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy more grocery items to resell.

loans.name: Rosario Del Carmen

texts.es:
Rosario tiene 57 años de edad, solamente tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar hasta noveno grado,  está casada y su esposo es agricultor, tiene 4 hijos como fruto de su matrimonio y solamente una vive con ellos que se está preparando como profesional en la universidad y por lo tanto nadie más depende de ellos. 

Su vida ha sido de mucho trabajo, pues desde hace 18 años se dedica a un negocio de venta de agua, ya que en su propiedad hay un pozo de agua, además su compañero de vida siembra frijol desde hace varios años.

Ella tiene muchas necesidades, pero principalmente está solicitando este préstamo; porque tiene que pagar a los mozos para limpiar y clasificar el frijol y sacar el de mejor calidad para venderlo, ya que hace una siembra de 7 hectáreas y necesita de la mano de obra para cubrir esta labor.

Rosario tiene muchos planes a futuro, entre algunos de ellos está poder comprar un terreno cercano, pues donde siembra actualmente está demasiado lejos, también desea hacer más grande la siembra  para generar más  ganancias y que a su hija no le falte nada en el  proceso de preparación de su carrera universitaria.
texts.en:
Rosario is 57 years old.  She only had the opportunity to attend school through ninth grade.  She is married and her husband is a farmer.  They have four children, only one of whom lives with them while attending university, and no one else depends on them.

Her life has been a lot of work.  She has had a business selling water for 18 years, since there is a well on her property.  Her husband has planted beans for many years.

She has many needs, but her main reason for requesting this loan is to pay for workers to clean and organize the beans and separate the best quality ones for sale.  They plant seven hectares and need workers to do the work.   

Rosario has many plans for the future, including being able to purchase a nearby piece of land since where they plant now is too far away.  She also wants to increase the number of crops they plant to generate more income and their daughter does not lack anything while she attends university.

loans.use: to pay workers to clean and separate beans.

loans.name: Hà

texts.en:
Hà is 40 years old and married with two children. She lives and works in Nong Cong district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with one dependent. Her other child is a grown up. Hà has a business growing rice and raising poultry and cattle and has been involved in these businesses for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Hà faces in her business is the lack of capital.
 
Hà is requesting a loan to purchase material such as brick, sand and cement to build a toilet, bathroom and water tank. She and her family don't have latrines so they use the neighbor's latrine. In 2014, Hà joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her family's lives. This is Hà's first loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. With her business profit, Hà hopes for her business to do well, to remodel her house, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase materials to build a toilet, bathroom and water tank

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en:
Shamim is a 37-year-old woman, residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a mother of three daughters and two sons. 

Her husband has been running a crockery store (utensils sales) for many years and he is solely responsible for providing financial support for the entire family. 

Shamim is applying for a Kiva loan from its field partner, BRAC Pakistan, because her husband has to purchase different types of crockery (e.g., jugs, glasses, plates, dinner sets). This loan will help her husband to purchase these items, for reselling purposes, so that he can earn maximum profit and increase his daily sales. He can also use the profit amount as savings, to fulfill future needs.

Shamim is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy crockery for her husband's shop.

loans.name: María Amparo

texts.es:
María, es una mujer trabajadora de 41 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar y prepararse debido a diversas dificultades económicas, su compañero de vida se dedica a la agricultura y tienen 8 hijos, los cuales la mayoría ya son mayores de edad y solamente 3 viven con ellos, 2 se encuentran estudiando en la escuela y el otro trabaja para ayudar con los gastos de sus padres.

Ella es una mujer emprendedora que trabaja en diferentes actividades, como lo es al oficio doméstico, los sábados y domingos se va al campo a vender diversidad de productos como panes con pollo, gaseosa, agua, entre otros, de manera que no le falten ingresos económicos para sostener a la familia; tiene 10 años de trabajar en estos rubros. También ayuda a su pareja en la agricultura, pues tienen  2 hectáreas donde sembrar maíz y frijol, para llegar al lugar debe hacer un cansado recorrido de una hora a pie.

Este crédito cubrirá las necesidades por la que atraviesa María, pues lo  necesita para invertir en su humilde negocio (pollo, panes, bebidas, verduras) y para comprar una ternera.
texts.en:
Maria, a hard-working 41-year-old woman, wasn't able to go to school and prepare herself due to economic difficulties. Her life partner works in agriculture and they have eight children. Most of their children are adults and only three live with them; two are in school and the other one works to help with expenses.

She is an enterprising woman who works in various activities, including domestic work, and on Saturdays and Sundays she goes out to the country to sell various products such as bread with chicken, drinks, water, and other products. She does this work so she has enough income to support her family. She has ten years of experience in this work. She also helps her partner with farming, since they have two hectares where they plant corn and beans. The land is a one-hour walk away.

This loan will cover various needs that Maria has. She needs to invest in her small business with chicken, bread, drinks, and vegetables, and to buy a calf.

loans.use: to buy chicken, bread, drinks, and vegetables for her business, as well as a calf.

loans.name: Nan

texts.en:
A rural villager from the Dambae district, Nan is 54 years old and married. She has three children. She is a rice farmer with 1.5 hectares of farmland and supplements the family’s income by growing cassava. Having been in this business for almost 34 years. she currently can earn about 25,000 KHR per day
. 
This is the first microloan for Nan. Now she is seeking a loan to buy pesticides and pay labor fees. She hopes to make a better living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy pesticides and pay labor fees

loans.name: Ephentus

texts.en: Ephentus is 38 years old, married, and the father of three children in Thika. He runs a general store. He is married to Jane, who helps him run the shop. Their children are 13, 11 and 9 years old.  He does not have enough funds to buy more stock to serve his ever-growing customer base. With a loan through VisionFund Kenya, Ephentus will be able to purchase 10 bags of sugar and 10 bags of rice.  Ephentus is applying for his fifth loan from VisionFund Kenya, having successfully completed repaying all his previous loans. The additional income created will allow him to reinvest in his business. In the future, Ephentus would like to invest in his children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase 10 bags of sugar and 10 bags of rice to serve his growing customer base.

loans.name: Valery

texts.en:
Valery, 25 years of age, is married to a welder and blessed with one child. She has owned and operated a retail store for almost three years, earning a net income of PHP 2,000 weekly. Her net profits are usually spent on their electric bill and on the daily needs of their daughter. 

Due to insufficient funds, Valery would like to avail herself of a loan from those generous lenders, amounting to PHP 23,000, to purchase noodles, bread, coffee, coffee creamer, detergent powder, and fabric conditioner to sell. She's hoping that her requested loan will be granted, so that she can improve and further expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase noodles, bread, coffee, coffee creamer, detergent powder, and fabric conditioner to sell.

loans.name: Ashkhen

texts.en: Ashkhen lives in Araqs village with her husband and two grown sons. Their family owns a greenhouse where they cultivate tomatoes and greens. Ashkhen takes care of the greenhouse very attentively, as it is their only source of income. By applying for this loan, Ashkhen is asking Kiva lenders to help her with her greenhouse. The loan will be used to buy polyethylene covering for their greenhouse and tomato and cucumber seeds. This will allow Ashkhen and her family to continue their agribusiness and earn more income. The family hopes for your support.

loans.use: buy polyethylene covering for the family's greenhouse and tomato and cucumber seeds.

loans.name: José Celedonio

texts.es:
José tiene 42 años de edad, la difícil situación económica solo le permitió estudiar hasta segundo grado en la escuela, está casado y su pareja se dedica  al trabajo doméstico, tiene 3 hijos que viven con él y se dedican al trabajo del campo.

José siempre se ha dedicado al trabajo en el campo, desde muy pequeño le ayudaba a  sus padres y así fue como aprendió esta actividad, actualmente, él está preparando la tierra para sembrar 5,250 metros cuadrados con regadío, y tiene que ir en bus que hace un recorrido de aproximadamente 1 metro 45.

El crédito que está solicitando, es para invertir en las labores agrícolas y comprar insumos como abono y fertilizantes. El préstamo le será de muchísima ayuda, ya que no tiene el dinero disponible para realizar el trabajo.

Él espera que la parcela donde siembra, no tenga problemas o inconvenientes como plagas que puedan afectar el cultivo.
texts.en:
José is 42 years old.  His difficult financial situation only allowed him to study through second grade.  He is married and his wife does domestic work.  He has three children who live with him and work as farmers.

José has always worked as a farmer.  When he was young, he helped his parents and that is how he learned this work.  Currently, he is preparing 5,250 square meters of irrigated land for planting.  He has to take a bus that makes a journey of about 1 meter 45. 

He is requesting this loan to invest in his farm work and purchase supplies such as manure and fertilizer.  The loan will be a lot of help since he does not have money available to do the work.

He hopes that the land where he plants will not have problems or inconveniences such as diseases that will affect the crops.

loans.use: to purchase supplies like manure and fertilizer.

loans.name: Pauline

texts.en:
Pauline is 44 years old and she is in poultry farming. She is married to Francis who is also a farmer. They are blessed with two children. She earns a monthly income of KES 22,000, which she uses to support her family. 

This marks her first loan term with VisionFund Kenya after she was introduced by an existing client. With the loan she has applied for from VisionFund Kenya, she will be able to purchase poultry feed and one-day-old chicks for rearing. The additional income created will allow her to improve the standard of living for her family. 

In the future, Pauline would like to expand her poultry business further. She hopes to have an established business and a settled family.

loans.use: to purchase poultry feed and one-day-old chicks for rearing.

loans.name: Chynara

texts.ru: Чынаре 40 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 3 детей. Старшая дочь и сын-студенты, третий сын-школьник. У Чынары - средне-специальное образование, она работает медсестрой в школе, супруг начиная с осени до конца зимы занимается оптовой продажей угля. Чынара в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи занимается полеводством и животноводством, стартовав 19 лет назад, с 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Чынары, на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 бычка, 6 овец, также имеется 1,28 ГА земельной доли, на которой ежегодно выращивает фасоль для реализации. Ежемесячный совокупныЙ доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Чынара обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом для закупа высококачественных семян фасоли для посевных работ и удобрений для обработки земли. Чынара намерена получить хороший урожай, что непременно приведет к увеличению капитала семьи. Доходы от кредита Чынара планирует вложить в приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на строительство нового помещения для скота.
texts.en: Chynara is 40 years old, married and raising 3 children together with her husband. The oldest daughter and son are college students, and the third son is a school student.  Chynara has a secondary-specialized education.  She works as a nurse at a school, and her husband is involved in wholesale sales of coal starting from autumn until the end of winter.  To provide an additional income for her family, Chynara is involved in farming and animal husbandry, having started 19 years ago with a purchase of livestock with 5,000 som (KGS). Thanks to her hard work, today her business contains 2 bulls, 6 sheep, and also a 1.28 hectare land plot, where she annually grows beans for sale. The aggregate monthly income amounts to 15,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her business, Chynara requested a loan from the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" to buy high-quality bean seeds for sowing work and fertilizers for treating soil.  Chynara intends to get a good harvest, which will certainly lead to increase the family's capital.  Chynara plans to invest the earnings from the loan into increasing domestic livestock quantities and saving money to to build a new space for the livestock.

loans.use: to buy bean seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Djamila

texts.ru: Джамиле 38 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. У Джамили - среднее образование. По характеру Джамиля очень ответственная, общительная, жизнерадостная. Супруг работает наемным пастухом. Имеет определенные доходы. Джамиля занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 3 года назад, с покупки скота на 50,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Джамили, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS), также обрабатывает 1,14 ГА земли, где в основном выращивает -фасоль. Полученный урожай реализуют оптовым поставщикам. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Джамиля обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум"  за кредитом - на покупку лошади для увеличения поголовья скота, приобретя лошадь они смогут упростить и ускорить процесс обрабатывания земельного надела. Доходы от кредита Джамиля планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на расширение сарая для содержания скота.
texts.en: Djamila is 38 years old, married and raising 5 children together with her husband. Djamila has a secondary education.  She is very responsible, personable and happy.  Her husband works as a shepherd-for-hire and has a set income.  Djamila is involved in animal husbandry and farming, having started 3 years ago with a purchase of livestock with 50,000 som (KGS). Thanks to her hard work, today her business contains 1 dairy cow. The monthly income amounts to 10,000 som (KGS).  She also works on 1.14 hectares of land, where she primarily grows beans.  They sell the resulting harvest to wholesale distributors.  In order to further develop her business, Djamila requested a loan from the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" to buy a horse in order to increase livestock headcount.  Having bought a horse, they would be able to simplify and speed up the process of treating the land plot.  Djamila plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further increasing domestic livestock quantities and saving money to expand a barn for keeping livestock.

loans.use: to buy a horse
